title: Dinner Time in the Tower
goal: Reach the dining room before dinner gets cold

rooms.name: Tower Bedroom
rooms.description: A bedroom atop a tall tower with stone walls dimly lit by flickering candles. Through the window you see snow-capped mountains in the distance. The air is cold and still.

items.name: four-poster bed
items.description: A large bed with heavy curtains

items.name: wooden closet
items.description: A tall wooden closet with ornate carvings

items.name: oak dresser
items.description: A dresser with three drawers - top, middle, and bottom

items.name: letter from the King
items.description: A letter addressed to 'Our Dearest Daughter'
items.text: My dearest daughter, remember that Philip always serves us faithfully. The numbers of our family are important: I was born in year 476. Love, Father the King

items.name: letter from the Queen
items.description: A letter with the Queen's seal
items.text: My precious daughter, never forget who you are - a princess of this realm. Your father and I await you at dinner. Love, Mother the Queen

items.name: wooden trapdoor
items.description: A trapdoor in the corner of the room leading down

rooms.name: Spiral Staircase
rooms.description: A long spiral staircase winding down the interior of the tower. Stone walls are lined with portrait paintings, each with a nameplate and description beneath.

items.name: portrait of Philip
items.description: A painting of a stern man in servant's clothes
items.text: Philip - Head Butler. Responsible for maintaining the household and overseeing meal service.

items.name: portrait of young Jack
items.description: A painting of a sad-looking young boy
items.text: Jack - Stable Boy. Orphaned at age 7. Parents rest in the castle graveyard. Works hard caring for the horses.

items.name: portrait of Lady Margaret
items.description: A painting of an elegant noblewoman
items.text: Lady Margaret - Court Advisor. Known for her wisdom and connection to the royal family.

items.name: heavy oak door
items.description: A sturdy door at the bottom of the staircase. A paper with three questions is taped to it.

password_questions.question: Who does the dishes?
password_questions.hint: Check the portraits for someone who works in the household

password_questions.question: Who are you?
password_questions.hint: The letters in your bedroom might remind you

rooms.name: Grand Dining Room
rooms.description: A magnificent dining hall with a long table set for a feast. The King and Queen sit at the head of the table, smiling warmly. Candles illuminate platters of delicious food.

items.name: royal feast
items.description: A wonderful spread of food - roasted meats, fresh bread, fruits, and desserts

rooms.win_message: You made it to dinner on time! The King and Queen welcome you warmly to the table. Yum! You win!
